actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Coinage Act of 1965 to change the size, weight, and design of the one-dollar coin, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Coinage Act of 1965 to change the size and weight of the one-dollar coin. Requires that such coins bear on the obverse side the likeness of Harriet R. Tubman superimposed over that of Susan B. Anthony and on the reverse the unfurled flag of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Coinage Act of 1965 to change the size, weight, and design of the one-dollar coin, and for other purposes.
